Headline: #8A South Halsted Temporary Northbound Reroute near 79th/Halsted
ShortDescription: NB 8A South Halsted buses are temporarily rerouted via Halsted, Terminal, Emerald, 81st, & Vincennes, due to street blockage near 79th/Halsted.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #8A South Halsted buses are temporarily rerouted via Halsted, Terminal, Emerald, 81st, & Vincennes, due to street blockage near 79th/Halsted.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
